title: FL class kerning bug
content:
I just activated FL 5.0.4 for Mac - it has the same bug as every version since 5.0

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907000737im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/bug-1_4339.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907000737im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/bug-2_5720.jpg)

When clicking the blue box under the character in the preview window it doesn’t show ’key glyph in class’ or ’referenced in class’ as it should.

Oh well - back to 5.0 again.

Does anybody else have this problem?

 [‹ True Type parsing issue](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907000737/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35069 "Go to previous forum topic") [Problem: Ligature substitutions don't work with VOLT or FontLab ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907000737/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34998 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Nick Cooke
